comment.body:
This issue also shows up on my iPad running iPad OS 15.4 with AdGuard installed. Same situation; video is present and working on Chrome, not on Safari.

I’m using standard AdGuard filters, AdGuard DNS and not using Stealth Mode.

There was no problem accessing the video in question on Safari until recently.

Best,

Lynn

> On Jun 16, 2022, at 6:14 AM, Alex ***@***.***> wrote:
> 
> 
> Not reproduced. What causes an issue - filters, DNS filtering or stealth mode?

issue.title: eksisozluk.com, fixes search-box text ads
issue.body:
"sponsorlu" list items removal and search box placeholder ads text hiding,

tested on Firefox (Windows), Chrome (Windows), Chrome mobile mode via DevTools (Windows)

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?
hides/removes search box ads on eksisozluk.com.

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?
Search box ads become hidden and removed.

### Enter the issue address

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located






1. Your comment

They put text ads into search box placeholder. My fix hides it. They add 2 list items (`<li>`) to search results. I removed them from DOM. Also there is a text "sponsorlu" (means sponsored) next to the search box. My fix hides it. 

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot placeholder ads (before fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox1-bf](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173846855-e9a25c5c-5af2-4822-bcf4-4a88feaf2eac.PNG)


</details>
<details>
<summary>Screenshot placeholder ads (after fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox1-af](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173847520-43a5feb5-b0df-4617-b804-6dda6595d9d2.PNG)


</details>
<details>

<summary>Screenshot search results ads (before fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox2-bf](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173846864-ed6489af-48da-4793-9666-215187434696.PNG)

</details>
<details>
<summary>Screenshot search results ads (after fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox2-af](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173847538-1e96cf3d-7a5f-4a3f-8861-266ab1423edb.PNG)


</details>

### Terms

pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [ ] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/13739

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [x] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

issue.title: www.mydealz.de
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.mydealz.de/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.mydealz.de%2F) ### Comment > Rufe ich die Website zum ersten mal auf funktioniert diese immer korrekt. Nachdem ich zwei drei Unterseiten aufgerufen habe und oben links über das Banner wieder auf die Startseite zurück möchte, wird diese nicht mehr vollständig geladen. > > Sobald ich AdGuard deaktiviere lädt die Seite sofort wieder vollständig. Ist AdGuard aktiviert lässt sich die Seite nur per Shift+F5 (vollständiger Refresh) wieder korrekt laden. Ein einfacher Refresh (F5) reicht nicht aus. > > Unternimmt man gar nichts, dann kann die Website erst nach einigen Minuten wieder normal geladen werden. Es wirkt als würde im Hintergrund irgendeine Verbindung fehlerhaft offen bleiben, die erst wieder geschlossen werden muss. ### Screenshots

issue.body:
Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings.

---

Browser extension users should install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

After install `Tampermonkey`, change these options like on screenshot:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68199152-23c17800-ffc6-11e9-99f2-13643aa771ae.png)


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68200995-a3047b00-ffc9-11e9-9999-cdcf35a0f750.png)

comment.body:
@caleb59 it's related to the AdGuard Extra and this task https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/328.
If you have to add something, please write to `@stanislav-atr` there.

issue.body:
Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings.

---

Browser extension users should install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

After install `Tampermonkey`, change these options like on screenshot:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68199152-23c17800-ffc6-11e9-99f2-13643aa771ae.png)


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68200995-a3047b00-ffc9-11e9-9999-cdcf35a0f750.png)

comment.body:
I can also confirm that disabling AdGuard Extra in Extensions fixes problem but this is only another workaround.
First one is to add an exclusion to twitch.tv in Settings/Network/Filter HTTPS protocol.

issue.title: eksisozluk.com, fixes search-box text ads
issue.body:
"sponsorlu" list items removal and search box placeholder ads text hiding,

tested on Firefox (Windows), Chrome (Windows), Chrome mobile mode via DevTools (Windows)

# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/en/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?
hides/removes search box ads on eksisozluk.com.

### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [x] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [ ] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?
Search box ads become hidden and removed.

### Enter the issue address

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located






1. Your comment

They put text ads into search box placeholder. My fix hides it. They add 2 list items (`<li>`) to search results. I removed them from DOM. Also there is a text "sponsorlu" (means sponsored) next to the search box. My fix hides it. 

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot placeholder ads (before fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox1-bf](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173846855-e9a25c5c-5af2-4822-bcf4-4a88feaf2eac.PNG)


</details>
<details>
<summary>Screenshot placeholder ads (after fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox1-af](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173847520-43a5feb5-b0df-4617-b804-6dda6595d9d2.PNG)


</details>
<details>

<summary>Screenshot search results ads (before fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox2-bf](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173846864-ed6489af-48da-4793-9666-215187434696.PNG)

</details>
<details>
<summary>Screenshot search results ads (after fix):</summary>

![ekşi-searchbox2-af](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10234479/173847538-1e96cf3d-7a5f-4a3f-8861-266ab1423edb.PNG)


</details>

### Terms

- [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
Hi @Alex-302. 

Thank you for your help. However this doesn't fix placeholder text ads. 

If they put a shown ads text to search box, we should hide it too. If they put informative placeholder, we shouldn't.

I think this line fixes it.

`eksisozluk.com##input#search-textbox:not([placeholder^='başlık,'])::placeholder:style(color:transparent) `

I thought `+js(remove-attr, placeholder, input#search-textbox)` as another option , however I couldn't find a way to seperate non-ads placeholder from ads placeholder.

comment.body:
@willb123456 

In this case, we need some detailed logs to troubleshoot your problem. Could you please record them for us? Here is an instruction:

1. In AdGuard, head to **Settings → General**
2. Enable Advanced mode and go to Advanced settings
3. Enable Debug logs
4. Reproduce the issue and remember the time when it happened
5. Head back to **Settings → Support → Export logs**, send them our way and tell the time the issue happened
6. Set the logging level back to Default

Please send the logs to support@adguard.com and mention this task in the email body.

issue.body:

tested on Firefox (Windows), Chrome (Windows), Chrome mobile mode via DevTools (Windows)

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\

## What problem does the pull request fix?
hides/removes search box ads on eksisozluk.com.

Search box ads become hidden and removed.

They put text ads into search box placeholder. My fix hides it. They add 2 list items (`<li>`) to search results. I removed them from DOM. Also there is a text "sponsorlu" (means sponsored) next to the search box. My fix hides it.

comment.body:
Yes, I have to disable Adguard for Mac otherwise the website won’t load the video. On iOS same behavior. If I disable the filter nothing happens. Only when I disable the Adguard in the app itself the website (and iOS app GoPlay) load the video.

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.twitch.tv/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2F) ### Comment > Реклама почти каждый день на таких сайтах как ютуб, твич и.т.д. Причём реклама появляется примерно через день. Писал в группу телеграм по этому поводу но никакого ответа не получил. issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.gosuslugi.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.gosuslugi.ru%2F) ### Comment > В новой версии 2.8.1.1140 release (CL-1.9.62, DNS-1.7.22) перестал открываться сайт gosuslugi.ru, при этом авторизация через него работает и через сторонний VPN тоже работает. Добавил его в исключения AdGuard, (в том числе в Сеть - фильтрация HTTPS - Исключения), но сайт по-прежнему не открывался. При выходе из приложения — загружается стабильно. Попробовал отключить защиту от DPI и в этом случае сайт открывается. ### Screenshots
